### Binary for sampling panorama ids and bearings for given buildings

#### Usage example
```
./pano_id_generation --input-table //home/maps/poi/streetview_poi/bld_orgs_ttk --output-table //home/maps/poi/streetview_poi/bld_pano_ids_ttk --pano-description-table //home/maps/poi/streetview_poi/pano_description_ttk
```

#### Parameters
* `--input-table` table with building geometry and organisations data, generated by [this bin](https://a.yandex-team.ru/arc/trunk/arcadia/maps/poi/streetview_poi/bld_orgs_creator)
* `--pano-description-table` table with pano_ids and coords [(generation example)](https://yql.yandex-team.ru/Operations/Xd_AVQlcTp9WrMyM2B2WIYN-9YLs9RIXoyQrGLN53kc=)
* `--output-table` output table with pano_ids and bearing
* `--boundary-points-distance` average distance (in meters) between sampled boundary points (default 20)
* `--max-pano-building-distance` discard panoramas that lie further than that distance (in meters)  from the building (default 30)
